item.title: Writing on a blog in 2018
item.description: I remember graduating from college in 2001 and having a regular habit of updating my blog. It was one of the main ways I stayed in touch with those who I left in various locales. Whether it was family in colorado or friends in Iowa - my blog was one of the better ways we connected. I wrote my first blog software in 2000 in PHP. It had templates and generated static HTML.
